Let Me Introduce Myself

A Marketer, Tech Enthusiast and Data Addict

And where do we began? I think, I’ve come a long way within the technological and creative sector. And for the most part, I fell in love in computer in general and learnt various knowledge from the Internet.

The sole purpose of having this blog was purely to document those experimental projects while trying to adopt to a certain edgy tech advancement. While of course, it wouldn’t be your most perfect documentation and writing, but it’d safe you sometime, when you’re trying to google your error-code over the Internet.

I’m also a self-taught developer, I experiment with a lot of edgy frontend frameworks, digital marketing strategy, machine learning and organic SERP through SEO methods. Hope you have a pleasant stay and enjoy reading my documentation.
